Detailed Description

Encrypts MP4 data using AES128ICM encryptor according to ISMA specifications with Sinf signalling.

Encrypts samples and adds information for decryption to MP4 stream.

Definition at line 43 of file ISMAMPEG4SinfDRMEncryptor.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ISMAMPEG4SINFDRMENCRYPTOR_EXPORT DRMPlugin::MPEG4SinfDRMPlugin::AES128ICMISMAMPEG4SinfDRMEncryptor::AES128ICMISMAMPEG4SinfDRMEncryptor (  IISMADRMEncManager *  drm,
std::string &  conID,
IXMLElement *  xmlDoc,
DRMLogger &  logger
) 
 

Constructor.

Mandatory tags in the XML file are:

  • ROOT.RightsHostURL

Here follows an example of a correctly formatted XML document.

      <ROOT>
       <RightsHostURL>localhost:8080</RightsHostURL>
      </ROOT>

Parameters:
drm input, DRM manager.
conID input-output, content identifier.
xmlDoc input, XML document.
logger input-output, message logger.
If constructor fails, it throws MPEG4DRMPluginException.

Encrypt sample sampleBuffer.

Returns encrypted sample in encSampleData.

Parameters:

sampleSize input, size of input sample.
encSampleData output, encrypted sample.
encSampleLen output, size of encrypted sample.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.

virtual ISMAMPEG4SINFDRMENCRYPTOR_EXPORT bool DRMPlugin::MPEG4SinfDRMPlugin::AES128ICMISMAMPEG4SinfDRMEncryptor::Finish (  UInt32T  originalFormat,
IMP4SinfAtom *  sinf
)  [virtual]
 

Add drm information into sinf atom.

Caller must take care that given sinf atom really coresponds to sample description atom which refers to encrypted samples.

Parameters:
originalFormat input, 4CC code of the original data format.
sinf input-output, sinf atom where to add drm information.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.
